events.message: I received my order yesterday, but the item is not what I expected and I would like to request a refund for it.
The issue has been identified as a refund request based on customer's message mentioning refund and dissatisfaction.
Support agent Sarah Johnson has been assigned to handle the refund case from customer regarding incorrect item.
Hello! This is Sarah from customer support. I understand you want a refund for your recent order. I’m here to help.
Could you please provide the order number and confirm if the item has been opened or used so we can process your refund?
Yes, the order number is 987654321 and the item is unopened. I realized it’s not the product I needed after receiving it.
Thank you for the details. We can process a full refund once you return the item. I will send you the prepaid shipping label shortly.
That sounds great, thank you! I appreciate the quick response and the easy refund process.
The return shipping label has been emailed to you. Please ship back the item to receive your refund within 5 business days upon receipt.
Just checking in to ensure you received the return label and if you need any further assistance with your refund.
Your refund has been completed and the case is now closed. Thank you for shopping with us, and we hope to assist you again.
We sent you a brief satisfaction survey regarding your refund experience. We would appreciate your feedback to improve our services.
I completed the survey and rated the process 5 stars. Thanks for the excellent support and smooth refund handling.
This refund case has been archived following standard procedure after closure and survey completion to maintain records.
